notes_display: Obv./rev. blind spot; rev. die cracks, slightly double struck
issue_obverse_figure_s: Right profile of Wahram IV on frontal bust
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: crown cap; crown with mural element and one staggered wing; covered korymbos; ribbons between crown cap and korymbos pointing to the left, pearl diadem, two ribbons commencing  to the left and right below ball of hair pointing upwards; earing consisting of two elements; tunica, neck-line edged with double row of pearls running from shoulder to the breast ornament (only upper part visible); dotted border
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: base consisting of two elements; round altar shaft; on the shaft l'st (rāst, "just"); to the left and right of the shaft ribbons pointing downwards, three altar slabs; above bust with altar flames; to the left and right of altar attendant with stylized crown of Wahram IV, holding a barsom with both hands, both figures facing inwards; dotted border
